collection:
This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that
is collected and recorded by Website Name and how we use it.

This policy is not applicable to
any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

## Information we collect

The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why
you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you
to provide your personal information.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you
such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message
and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose
to provide.

When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information,
including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and
telephone number.

The information collected by log files include internet
protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date
and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks.

These cookies are used to store
information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that
the visitor accessed or visited.
They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.

In order to utilize this
feature, you will need to sign in with your Google account and grant us
permission to access your Google Calendar.

Compliance with Limited Use RequirementsIn line with Google's Limited Use
requirements, we only request and use your Google Calendar data for the sole
purpose of providing you with the async meeting scheduling functionality
within our application.

User Consent**  
  
We obtain your explicit consent before accessing your Google Calendar data.

## GDPR Privacy Policy (Data Protection Rights)

Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:  
  
Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the
categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected
about consumers.

Website Name does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information
from children under the age of 13.
sharing:
## Limited Use Requirements and Google Calendar Integration

Papr's use and transfer to any other app of information received from Google
APIs will adhere to [Google API Services User Data
Policy](https://developers.google.com/terms/api-services-user-data-
policy#additional_requirements_for_specific_api_scopes), including the Limited
Use requirements.

We do not share, sell, or use your data for any other
purpose.
